item.title: Self-Study in August 2023
item.description: Elixir saves Pinterest M a year in server costs An example of how rewriting a microservice from AWS Lambda to elixir can save 97% of server costs. item.title: Self-Study in July 2019
item.description: How I use reveal.js This author explains how they use reveal.js. The online editor (slides.com). The author uses plain html for storing the slides.
